entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content:
My name is Alexander Hoffman and welcome to my personal website! Here, you can read about me or you can see a list of my publications. Please also feel free to contact me by email or follow me on twitter, where I occasionally post things about my work.

I’m attending this year’s AIChE conference, where I’ll be giving three talks and a presenting a poster at the faculty candidate session. Here are the details:

  1. ”” in the faculty candidate poster session—Poster XYZ, 1:00 to 3:00 PM Sunday, 13 Nov 2022
  2. ”” in Heterogeneous Catalysis II—1:00 to 3:00 PM Monday, 14 Nov 2022
  3. ”” in Heterogeneous Catalysis II—1:00 to 3:00 PM Monday, 14 Nov 2022
  4. ”” in Heterogeneous Catalysis II—1:00 to 3:00 PM Tuesday, 14 Nov 2022

I hope to see you there!
